snippet.title: Because Shep - White House Menu Report
snippet.description: Shepard Smith provides in-depth coverage of the presidential pantry with an exhaustive reading of the White House menu.

snippet.title: Faith/Off - Easter vs. Passover
snippet.description: Passover celebrants have to take it up a notch to compete with the chocolate eggs and fake grass of Easter.

snippet.title: February 12, 2014 - Godfrey Reggio
snippet.description: Stephen attends the White House State Dinner, Bill O'Reilly gloats over his Obama interview, Shepard Smith recites the White House menu, and Godfrey Reggio talks "Visitors."
